item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Crossing the uncanny valley of conversational voice (278 points | 143 comments)
2. The early days of Linux (2023) (292 points | 71 comments)
3. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (458 points | 42 comments)
4. Show HN: Robyn – "Batman Inspired" Python Web Framework Built with Rust (36 points | 34 comments)
5. 'Slime' keeps the brain safe ― and could guard against ageing (71 points | 26 comments)
6. The three-dimensional Kakeya conjecture, after Wang and Zahl (22 points | discuss)
7. A cross-platform multi-target dotfiles manager written in Rust (54 points | 41 comments)
8. NIH.gov DNS servers down, making PubMed, BLAST, etc. unreachable (279 points | 174 comments)
9. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (249 points | 48 comments)
10. The A.I. Monarchy (48 points | 32 comments)
11. 'Destiny 2' Reveals Its 'Content Shredder' as a Result of Recent Lawsuit (13 points | 7 comments)
12. Free introns of tRNAs as complementarity-dependent regulators of gene expression (7 points | discuss)
13. Mozilla flamed by Firefox fans after reneging on promises to not sell their data (79 points | 24 comments)
14. Firefly Blue Ghost Mission 1 Lunar Landing (117 points | 29 comments)
15. Euclid finds complete Einstein Ring in NGC galaxy (127 points | 31 comments)
16. Show HN: I made a website where you can create your own "Life in Weeks" timeline (193 points | 51 comments)
17. AlgoMIDI – A Mathematical 'Music Studio' (46 points | 7 comments)
18. Reimagining Fluid Typography (45 points | 14 comments)
19. Passing the Buck: The story of the 2022 Wings Over Dallas air show collision (55 points | 10 comments)
20. What, if anything, should I do about using Mozilla's Firefox (71 points | 79 comments)
21. Efabless – Shutdown Notice (133 points | 59 comments)
22. Nuclear Reactor Lasers: From fission to photon (58 points | 7 comments)
23. Python as a second language empathy (2018) (57 points | 29 comments)
24. How Flash games shaped the video game industry (2020) (159 points | 95 comments)
25. Abusing C to implement JSON parsing with struct methods (97 points | 47 comments)
26. Why it's so hard to build a jet engine (399 points | 190 comments)
27. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (171 points | 222 comments)
28. Maestro – Next generation mobile UI automation (167 points | 60 comments)
29. Emacs Tree-sitter custom highlighting (113 points | 11 comments)
30. Rifling through the archives with Robert Caro (35 points | 1 comment)
